ml.dataset
Class DataSet

java.lang.Object
  ml.dataset.DataSet
Direct Known Subclasses:
UCIDataSet
public abstract class DataSet
extends java.lang.Object

A data set wrapping all the data.

Author:
Ping He, Xiaohua Xu
See Also:
